dbse.fopj.blinktopus.resources

Class QueryProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • dbse.fopj.blinktopus.resources.QueryProcessor

  • @Path(value="/")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public class QueryProcessor
extends java.lang.Object
    Resource class that parses user's query and redirects it either to LogManager or SVManager.
    Author:
    Pavlo Shevchenko (urmikl18)

 @GET

 @GET
 @Timed
public LogResult getAllLog()
        Returns:

      • query

        @Path(value="/query")
 @GET
 @Timed
public Result query(@QueryParam(value="SVid")
                                                        java.lang.String SVId,
                                                        @QueryParam(value="type")
                                                        java.lang.String type,
                                                        @QueryParam(value="table")
                                                        java.lang.String table,
                                                        @QueryParam(value="attr")
                                                        java.lang.String attr,
                                                        @QueryParam(value="lower")
                                                        java.lang.String lower,
                                                        @QueryParam(value="higher")
                                                        java.lang.String higher,
                                                        @QueryParam(value="create")
                                                        java.lang.String createSV,
                                                        @QueryParam(value="distinct")
                                                        java.lang.String distinct)
        The method that returns relevant tuples and relevant information about the query to the user.
        Parameters:
        SVId - The ID of a Storage View to be used to answer user's query.
        type - The type of a Storage View to be used to answer user's query (Col,Row,AQP).
        table - The table to be queried (Order/LineItem)
        attr - The attribute to be queried on (e.g. totalprice/extendedprice)
        lower - The lower boundary of a range query.
        higher - The higher boundary of a range query.
        createSV - True, if new SV of given type should be created, false, otherwise.
        distinct - True, if a number of unique values in given range should be returned, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        An instance of a class Result that contains information about the query (table, attr, lower, higher), information about SV (Id, Type (Col,Row,AQP)), information about result (tuples, size), and analytical information (time it took to retrieve the result, and error if necessary).
